de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.im

Class ImcAdapterTimeProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.im.AbstractTimeProxy
      • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.adapter.im.ImcAdapterTimeProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.attribute.Attributed, ImAdapter<ImcConnectionAdapter>, ImcAdapter

     class ImcAdapterTimeProxy
extends AbstractTimeProxy
implements ImcAdapter
    IMC adapter time controlling proxy. Controls the runtime of an IMC function call and cancels a function call if necessary.
